name: Froth Blowing Contest
description: No, it's the opposite. It's like my heart is getting hard. I don't care if it takes from now till the end of Shrimpfest. We have unlimited juice? This party is going to be off the hook. Teamocil.

name: Luau Dance Party
description: I'd rather be dead in California than alive in Arizona. WHY was this show cancelled? I mean, COME ON. Or it could be your colon. I'd want to get in there and find some answers. What have we always said is the most important thing?

name: Some Band
description: They're not gonna strip, right? I told them not to, but I can't guarantee their instincts won't kick in. Make love in your *own* hand, Mother! I've used one adjective to describe myself. What is it? Look at us, crying like a bunch of girls on the last day of camp.
